Posts.Content: Thankyou so much for your reply, i was stunned and wasn't sure where to look for help, glad i came on here now
Posts.Title: Can a ct scan pick up breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi im new, after losing weight and suffering chronic back/stomach pain and also having urinary incontinence i was referred for a ct scanof abdomen, pelvis and chest, have just received a letter saying they found an abnormality in my breast and they have urgently referred me to a breast surgeon, im not sure if this means i may have breast cancer can anyone advise me please ive been unable to sleep thanks
Posts.Title: Can a ct scan pick up breast cancer
